title: New Blood (Melrose, #1)
description: In a world where big corporations are controlled by a secret society, Beau is on track to have everything he ever wanted and more. And there is only one woman that stands in his way - As long as she can resist falling in love with the man of her dreams.In this contemporary tale of power, greed, ambition, love and death, what would you be prepared to sacrifice to have it all?
author: Paul Dorset
